rooms.description: Entrance hall with Vastu-compliant north and south openings for positive energy flow.
Scandinavian design open-plan living area combining kitchen and dining space with ample natural light from large north-facing windows.
Open-plan kitchen integrated within the living area, featuring modern fixtures and functional layout following Vastu norms with east-west alignments.
Guest bedroom on ground floor, located towards the west to ensure privacy and positive energy flow per Vastu guidelines.
